page.title: 03WETHERBY - DAVID'S WEEKEND 1
page.content:
Saturday
A typical Saturday morning for me is.......Wake up, the light is dim, 5 a.m., back to sleep again. Wake yet again, 9 a.m.! Rush downstairs to find everybody munching at their breakfast. Spread my toast, gulp my orange juice down, clean my teeth, wash my face, comb my hair and get dressed. Look outside. RAIN! Forget tennis! I start an Airfix model, never finish it so I decide to watch the cricket on T.V. Why not have a game myself? I get my brothers outside. After a while, come in again, watch a film on T.V. and then put the computer on for an hour. Finally, at 9.30., tired, I flop into bed!
